claim_card.claim: Post-check targets are defined: 1–4 NTs per eddy time (cylinder wake Re≈100), ≥1% local energy change near NTs, and <5% NT-list change under λ±0.1.
claim_card.test_hook: Compute all three checks on a canonical dataset; reject runs failing thresholds.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: NT list changes by less than 5% when λ is varied by ±0.1
